tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My tooth was very much sensitive to cold water. Dr. Amruta took X-ray of my teeth thoroughly and gave it to me on my mobile also for my records. and then she explained me very nicely about my problem and also about overall root canal treatment seating's in layman's language which made me very easy to understand it. She had given me root-canal treatment and also smooth capping (crown) on it. Also i would like to mention this that i am working woman so she adjusted my appointments in evening time which was suitable for me. It was really very good experience Dr. Amruta and will surely visit your clinic every 6 months interval.
reply_text: Thankyou Madhugandha we are glad you are satisfied with our treatment.

tags: Value for money,
review:
Before treatment starts Doctor explains you in detail which we need to understand about our oral care,means which treatment is to be done.. what will happen next if it is not done,

During treatment explains each and every step of treatment and makes you comfortable. 

Doctor is highly experienced and professional...
first class sanitized equipment,pleasant ambience,
Better options for appointment as clinic is open on weekends too.

Satisfied with treatment...

Highly recommended to get the result like clinics name suggest.... ESTHETIC SMILE...üòäüòÅ

Thank you for your treatment Dr. Amruta Wakde Desai
reply_text: Thank you so much Anita for your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In January 2018 after referring feedback, I approached Dr. Amruta for treating my toothache. She performed Root Canal & Ceramic Cap was fixed. In cleanup session, we found different issues related to other teeth. Entire treatment was completed within one month duration. I like her method of working Eg. 
(1) Limited appointments in a day to achieve maximum work in single session. 
(2) Precise Documentation related to Patient's medical history, Work done per session and applicable charges per session etc. 
(3) After completion of entire treatment, collection of OPG X-Ray  from patient  for future reference.  
Thank You so much Dr Amruta !!!
reply_text: Thank you Vaishali aunty for your feedback.

tags: None
context: Chipped Tooth,Fractured Tooth,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: It was a wonderful experience at Esthetic Smiles Dental Clinic. I had an issue with Food Lodgement in between my molars. The crown fitted for my upper molar at the previous dentist was not proper. It was troubling me for months . Dr. Amruta  replaced the crown with a new one and was a perfect fit. Post treatment there was no issue with food Lodgement also one of my lower molar crown was fractured which was replaced with a new crown and got a 15 years warranty for the same. The hygiene maintained and professionalism of the doctor was commendable. I had the best dentist experience until now. I would really  recommend Dr. Amruta to everyone.
reply_text: Thankyou Mr. Ajit  for your feedback. Glad you are happy with the treatment offered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited this clinic with my husband today .we got recommendation from our friend. I got all my teeth cleaned.Dr Amruta explained all existing dental problems. She even explained in detail the process of decay and how a tooth can be saved. She explains in detail and is very sweet . We would recommend her and wish her all the best.
reply_text: Thank you for your Feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review:
I visited  Esthetic smiles dental clinic for my teeth sensitivity issues. On examining my teeth Dr. Amruta suggested me to get fillings done for 4 of my teeth which had deep  decays and then follow with a flouride treatment.
She completed my treatment in 2 sittings and my sensitivity has drastically reduced. I would definitely recommend Dr. Amruta as she saved 4 of my teeth from a root canal. Now i can enjoy Ice Creams ... Tyu Doc :)
reply_text: Thankyou Anay .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had decay in my front teeth there was no pain but Doctor explained me if I dont get it treated it might end-up into a nerve infection.  so i decided to go for tooth color fillings as suggested and trust me doctor did a fabulous job. i couldnt identify the filling from my tooth perfect color match of cement. thankyou Dr.Amruta m veryy happyy :). Will see you after 6 months for regular checkup.  I recommend this doctor
reply_text: Thank you Anita we are glad that you are happy with our treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I has visited Dr. Amruta's clinic for a regular checkup. She consulted me and told me that i had a cavity in my wisdom tooth and the tooth before that.She worked on my teeth ********** *** * ****** ********** *** ***** Then she gave me tooth coloured composite fillings. It didnt feel that any work was done as the teeth looked as original. Fine and painless work by doc. Thankyou doc

tags: None
review: I had spaces between my front teeth and I didn't wanting go for wire treatments because of their long duration . Cosmetic fillings was suggested to me. After trial sessions  what they call as mock up session I was convinced and all my spaces disappeared within two sittings. No pain ,No surgery ,No multiple appointments. I am super happy.Thanks Doc.
reply_text: Thank you Saurabh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dental work always freaks me! However with Dr Amruta the experience was great. She is excellent in her work, explains the procedure before starting, and ensures that only the necessary work is done. Very professional in her approach yet a friendly attitude. My entire family has availed her services and have had similar experience. We strongly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you Trupti . Glad you are happy with our treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Any type of Tooth related treatment is always scary & painful, before & during the treatment. But, after visiting Esthetic Smiles, purely on basis of previous feedbacks written herewith, it was easy to verify these feedbacks by experiencing on my own. Dr. Amruta sees right through your toothache.
Esthetic Smiles truly makes you understand the phrase "Prevention is better than Cure" In entire duration of treatment main focus was on saving as many teeth as possible with timely treatments, than facing major problem due to neglect & delay.
Dr. Amruta is passionate about her profession & always aiming for well being of her patients teeth. Before & during the treatment you will be explained entire process & the need for it in a very calm manner. She is also very helpful in scheduling appointments according to patient's convenience.  Thank you Esthetic Smiles for retaining my Smile !!!
reply_text: Thank you so much Deepa . We are glad that you liked our services .
